#include <bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;

#define ll long long
#define ull unsigned long long
#define pb push_back
#define f first
#define s second
#define PI 3.14159265359
typedef pair<int,int> ii;
typedef pair<int,pair<int,int> > iii;

int main(int argc, const char * argv[])
{
    ios_base::sync_with_stdio(false);
    cin.tie(NULL);
    
    int t,n,m,a,i;
    cin>>t;
    
    while(t--)
    {
        cin>>n>>a>>m;
        
        for(i=1;i<=m;i++)
        {
            a++;
            if(a==n+1)
                a=1;
        }
        
        cout<<a<<"\n";
    }
    
    return 0;
}
